## getIn() function

Allows to get a value deeply in an object without throwing an exception if the path does not exist.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getIn(obj: any, key: string, defaultValue?: any): any;
```

| Parameter    | Type   | Description |
| ------------ | ------ | ----------- |
| obj          | any    | test        |
| key          | string | test        |
| defaultValue | any    | test        |
